# init(voiceShortcut:)

**Initializer**

Creates a view controller with the shortcut to edit or remove.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(voiceShortcut: INVoiceShortcut)
```

## Parameters

- **voiceShortcut**: The shortcut to edit or remove.

## Return Value

A newly initialized view controller.
title: init(voiceShortcut:)
